page.title: 18ADVENTURE CENTRE.
page.content: An adventure centre is situated in the village of Braithwaite.The building was originally a school which was owned and run by the chapel next door,now disused.It has now been transformed into an action centre, catering for the 7-13 age group.Groups come to the centre and stay either for a weekend or for a week. On the Sunday when we visited the centre,a group of Brownies were just arriving.They were remaining at Braithwaite until the following Friday.We were told that they planned to visit Haworth,the home of the Bronte Sisters and Cliffe Castle park in Keighley.They were also planning to go on a selection of local nature walks.The centre also has plenty of leisure facilities,including sports and camping equiptment.
